Package gui.util

Class GUIUtil

java.lang.Object
gui.util.GUIUtil
public class GUIUtil
extends java.lang.Object
Utility class for GUI related operations.

  • Method Details

    • getBorderPainters

      public static java.util.List<LinePainter> getBorderPainters​(Environment environment)
      Generate a list of painters which paint the borders, based on the max x and y coordinates possible.
      Parameters:
      environment - The environment which is bounded by a maximum x and y coordinate.
      Returns:
      A list of painters which paint the borders of the environment.

    • getMoteMap

      public static java.util.Map<MoteWayPoint,​java.lang.Integer> getMoteMap​(Environment environment)
      Retrieve a map of mote waypoints to their visualization Ids.
      Parameters:
      environment - The environment storing all the motes.
      Returns:
      A map of mote waypoints (containing the mote positions) to their respective visualization Id.

    • getGatewayMap

      public static java.util.Map<org.jxmapviewer.viewer.Waypoint,​java.lang.Integer> getGatewayMap​(Environment environment)
      Retrieve a map of gateway waypoints to their visualization Ids.
      Parameters:
      environment - The environment storing all the gateways.
      Returns:
      A map of gateway waypoints (containing the gateway positions) to their respective visualization Id.

    • getOutputFile

      public static java.io.File getOutputFile​(java.io.File givenFile, java.lang.String extension)
      Retrieve an output file based on a given input file, which might not have the given extension yet.
      Parameters:
      givenFile - The file to be (possible) converted.
      extension - The extension which the output file should have.
      Returns:
      An output file which has the required extension.
